text:
Can we create custom cards for custom objects ?

The UI is limited to default objects

How would you go about building a module or an editable area of a page that never needs to be used again? Modules are re-usable but this just needs to be an editable section. Can you point me to the right guide if there is one?

Does anyone have ideas for how to associate an image or set of images to a contact and then use them in automated emails? Or alternatively, is it possible to have a contact property that contains an HTML code block to render an image(s)?

You could use the new <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/account/property-field-types-in-HubSpot|Rich Text property type> to add the image for each contact, then use a personalization token to add it to the email.

I don't see how you can add images. I recognize the description of the rich field property says it does. I've experimented with placing HTML code in the rich text property but HubSpot doesn't treat it as code.

Ultimately this field will get populated from another integration into HubSpot.
I misunderstood, I thought you were looking for a way to add an image, not add code for an image.
I don't see how I can add an image either.
There's no option/control for inserting media. Am I missing something?

I haven't had a need to use it for photos yet and didn't even realize the option wasn't there - this was one of the benefits of the property type when it was announced. I did discover you can copy/paste an image into the box though...
I submitted a correction for the documentation and am looking in the community to see if there is an idea related to images or insight why it's not there
I do see that I can copy & paste. That won't help me though. I would need a way to populate this field in an automated way too.
I understand, definitely not ideal, I'm not seeing anything in the release that indicates it wasn't going to be possible
